QuestData.Title: The Lord of Blackrock
QuestData.Description: Go to the Valley of Heroes and speak with Field Marshal Stonebridge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Venture to the Valley of Heroes in Stormwind City and speak with Field Marshal Stonebridge.
QuestData.RewardText: <Field Marshal Afrasiabi bows.>$B$BChoose your reward, let the celebration begin!
